warning.para: To prevent serious eye injury, always wear safe eye protection when you perform vehicle maintenance or service.

svcproc.title: General Information
svcproc.para: Drive axles generate small metal wear particles at a fairly steady rate, especially during the break-in period. If these fine, but hard particles are allowed to circulate in the lubricant, along with external moisture and dirt, internal components will wear at a much faster rate than normal.
